document.topic_text: How Do You Compare to the Competition? Get facts about other applicants with a CareerBuilder Account Sign Up Job Description Entry level position for talented software engineers in a forward looking company where technical excellence is highly valued. The Software Engineer will apply her or his skills to developing high-quality real-time embedded software for fielded electronics platforms. New hires will be exposed to the full software life-cycle from requirements development through integration and testing, as part of our standard rotation program for college graduates. You can expect to rotate to a new program, site, and business area or program phase on an approximately annual basis for the first few years of your career, to gain breadth in your experience.Duties include coding and testing moderately complex software programs and assisting in other software engineering activities such as integration testing, algorithm & data analysis and software troubleshooting under the supervision of a lead engineer. Work in a team environment supporting multiple programs utilizing a common software architecture performing Radar Warning and Electronic Attack capabilities. Perform real-time, embedded software development in C++ utilizing sound Object Oriented principles and conforming to existing code development strategies and processes. Utilize either Windows PC or Linux based software development environment and either x86 or PowerPC target and test environment. Minimum Education and Experience Bachelor's Degree or equivalent experience - Bachelor's degree in CS (Computer Science), CE (Computer Engineering), ECS (Electrical and Computer Science), or other Scientific degree with suitable software engineering content. - C++ and Java
